overview:
Heidi Nordby Lunde is the Chief Communications Officer at the Norwegian startup company Easybring.com.

After working with marketing and PR in companies like HP, Merkantildata and PA Consulting, she pioneered the work with user generated content and citizen journalism at the startup online newssite ABCNyheter.no. She combined this with co-hosting the talkshow Studio 5 on the Norwgian tv-channel Kanal FEM. She is frequently featured as a commentator on current affairs and social media in radio, television and as a columnist.

More information in Norwegian: http://no.wikipedia.org/wiki/HeidiNordbyLunde

relationships.title: Editor, citizen journalism & user generated content
